kw.name: Create Session
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=SERVER, url=http://127.0.0.1:8002, headers={}, cookies=None, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0

kw.name: Client Sends Message
kw.doc: Client gets request with ${message} in header 'iws', check status code 200 and set the value of response's header 'Accepted' in the test variable.

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: Get Request
kw.doc: Send a GET request on the session object found using the
kw.msg: Get Request using : alias=SERVER, uri=/, headers={u'iws': None} json=None

kw.name: Set Test Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current test.

kw.name: Should Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.

kw.name: Delete All Sessions
kw.doc: Removes all the session objects
